name: DC Tech Meetup
body:
### Welcome to the DC Tech Meetup The DC Tech Meetup convenes technologists, entrepreneurs, investors and the broader innovation community regularly to learn and share. Each month, 400+ innovators gather to see demos, launch products and meet their future co-founders, partners and funders. ### Helpful Links DCTM Meetup: bit.ly/dctechlist
Apply to Demo: bit.ly/dctm-events ### DCTM Team DJ Saul (@DarienJay100)
Shana Glenzer (@ShanaGlenzer)
Stephanie Nguyen (@nguyenist)
Zvi Band (@skeevis)
Michael Mayernick (@mmayernick) ### Support or Contact Email: DCTMeetup@gmail.com
Twitter: @DCTechMeetup
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
